short_summary: Hotel Accommodations for 10 personnel for variable period
description: CAF requires hotel accommodations for 10 personnel from 8 February 2023 until 31 July 2023 with the first option period to extend until 30 September 2023, a second option period to extend from 1 October 2023 to 31 December 2023, and add up to 15 single/double occupancy rooms at any time.
full_summary:
===============

**Hotel Accommodations - Wiesbaden, Germany**
------------------------------------------

**Tender Notice and Request for Proposal**
-----------------------------------------

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** W8484-230416/A
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Publication Date:** January 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 8, 2023, 09:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence, Canada
* **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ **Name:** Chelsea Fowler
	+ **Email:** chelsea.fowler@forces.gc.ca
	+ **Phone:** None
	+ **Fax:** None

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Germany
* **Regions of Delivery:** Germany

### Tender Description

CAF requires hotel accommodations for 10 personnel from February 8, 2023, until July 31, 2023, with the following options:

* **Option 1:** Extend up to September 30, 2023
* **Option 2:** Extend from October 1, 2023, to December 31, 2023
* **Additional Rooms:** Up to 15 single or double occupancy rooms can be added at any time.

### Attachments

The tender notice includes the following attachments:

* [CF-Based Hotels, Motels, and Commercial Accommodations](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/30/df5698c61aa1ed0ef3926e58b26bb005/eng_rfp_w8484-230416_final.pdf)
* [CAF Required Hotel Accommodations](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/01/40ceb5afa2ca10bf0b4b38ed3a6b0893/w8484-230416_wiesbaden_amendment_001_eng.pdf)
* [Addendum 001 - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents
